bosses.name: Kamaitachi
bosses.desc: Many unwary travellers fell victim to this slicing menace. At first they thought, 'It's just a breeze,' then comes the slaughter. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Hell Horse
bosses.desc: Only few dared to face this blazing mare. The path it leaves are the ashes of it's victims. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Kabutomushi Musha
bosses.desc: Known for its adamantine shell, no one has ever managed to leave a dent on it. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Kinkaku & Ginkaku
bosses.desc: They're the strongest generals of the 'Demon Army'. Kinkaku and Ginkaku specialize in razing fortified defenses to create a path for army. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Thunder Eagle
bosses.desc: An ancient being that has the power to command lightning on its will. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Mammoth King
bosses.desc: A prehistoric creature that has absorbed large amounts of 'Underworld Essence', which enabled it to evolve and survive through the ages. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Ocean Queen
bosses.desc: Possessed by the cursed trident, the 'Ocean Queen' wreaks havoc to any vessel who dares to cross its domain. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Ghost Soldier
bosses.desc: Once a noble warrior, it was consumed by malice. Now, it leaves destruction in its wake. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Battle Angel
bosses.desc: A combat angel who has lost its purpose. Driven by its conviction, it continues to slay anyone who cross its path. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Infernal Chimera
bosses.desc: An archdemon who consumed its own kind to become more powerful. The king of hell ordered it to oversee the “Hell’s Gate”. This boss has high accuracy.

bosses.name: Taowu & Taotie
bosses.desc: They are the most powerful generals of the 'Demon Army'. Taowu and Taotie specialize in razing fortified defenses to create a path for army. This boss has high accuracy.

eightext.talent_description: This talent focuses on the flexibility of 8 body parts and the art of taijutsu. Explosive power can be achieved under extreme mode, but there will be serious side effects.

eom.talent_description: An ancient eye skill which grants the user strong vision and perception, but it also brings a huge physical burden.

de.talent_description: Combine eye skill with acupuncture skill to give the user the ability to look through the target's nerves and meridians.

dp.talent_description: Dead Bone performer can summon deceased beings in battles. Advanced performer can manipulate more dead bones at the same time.

orochi.talent_description: Blessed by the great snake Orochi, the user gains protection and immunity to poison and also gains the ability to revive the dead.

sm.talent_description: A new body that was created by puppeteer after abandoning their flesh body. Become a full-fledged puppet while still being a puppeteer.

saint.talent_description: 'Saint Power' allows the user to achieve the pinnacle of chakra manipulation by understanding the fundamental essence of life.

insect.talent_description: Years of studying various insects and learning their biology has unraveled the secrets of insect utilization and manipulation.

sound.talent_description: The Demon Sound is combined by the elements of Thunder and Wind. Users interfere targets with different kinds of sounds and music.

wood.talent_description: The Enraged Forest is combined by the elements of Water and Earth. User manipulates the growth of tree and uses wood to attack target.

shadow.talent_description: Silhouette user manipulates human shadows to restrict and control target. Advanced user can incarnate shadows into physical objects and attack target directly.

lava.talent_description: Explosive Lava is combined by the elements of Fire and Earth. User damage target by ignition and explosion.

ice.talent_description: Combine Wind and Water elements together to form a new element type - Icy Crystal. Use low temperature to attack target or protect yourself.

iron.talent_description: Iron Sand is a powerful skill that manipulates particles to create versatile weapons or defenses. The user controls the iron sand to form barriers and projectiles, making it highly adaptable in combat.

crystal.talent_description: Crystal Manifestation taps into the latent energies of the environment, channeling them to create intricate and powerful crystalline structures.

eoc.talent_description: The Eye of Creation skills unlock visionary power, enabling users to manifest and reshape intricate realities with unparalleled creativity.

talent_eom_skill_1.talent_skill_description: The awakening of Eye of Mirror grants the user with the ability to copy the jutsu of an enemy

talent_eom_skill_2.talent_skill_description: The awakening of Crescent Eye of Mirror grants users with the ability to rebound the effects of genjutsu.

talent_eom_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Advanced Ninjutsu: Generate a violent blaze of flame to burn everything the user sees.

talent_eom_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Advanced Genjutsu: Target is trapped into a world of hallucinations.

talent_eom_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Advanced Ninjutsu: Chakra of user is incarnated into a titan.

talent_eom_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Advanced Genjutsu: Cast the ultimate genjutsu on own self so as to travel between the world of illusions and the real world.

talent_de_skill_1.talent_skill_description: The awakening of Dark Eye grants user with strong vision.

talent_de_skill_2.talent_skill_description: The Meridian Kekkai grants the user with the ability to rebound damage based on the reduced/absorbed amount of CP.

talent_de_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Anesthetize yourself to reduce damage and recover HP for a number of turns, but interfere with CP.

talent_de_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Visualize the position of meridians of target and give better chance to do critical damage.

talent_de_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Strengthen your meridian system to recover more chakra.

talent_de_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Aim at meridians of target and acupuncture to interfere target's flow of chakra in the body.

talent_eightext_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Basics: Concentrates chakra on your palm and punch the target.

talent_eightext_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Basic Combat: Elementary battle training that increases taijutsu damage.

talent_eightext_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Basic Taijutsu: Apply the usage of chakra into taijutsu and give better damage.

talent_eightext_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Advanced Combat: Fully utilize every part of the body.

talent_eightext_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Extreme Mode: Develop every part of the body to a superb condition for a short period of time. (Warning: serious side effects)

talent_eightext_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Advanced Taijutsu: Fatal attack to a target, must be used in Extreme Mode.

talent_dp_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Summon the soul of onmyouji to convert target's attack damage to HP.

talent_dp_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Summon the soul of samurai to attack target with sword.

talent_dp_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Summon the soul of onmyouji to protect you from physical damage.

talent_dp_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Summon the soul of samurai to rebound damage.

talent_dp_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Summon gravestones from the underworld to attack all target

talent_dp_skill_6.talent_skill_description: The fusion of onmyouji and samurai to combine the power of both to attack target.

talent_orochi_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Use the Orochi's power to reduce damage taken and recover HP.

talent_orochi_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Orochi's blessing grants you with immunity to poison and chance to recover HP when attacking (Bloodfeed).

talent_orochi_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Summon a snake to help you inflict poison to your opponent.

talent_orochi_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Summon snakes to bind your opponent and make them vulnerable.

talent_orochi_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Strike fear into your opponent with Orochi's Roar.

talent_orochi_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Use the power of the Orochi to revive your teammates. This comes at a great expense to your health and chakra.

talent_saint_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Extensive knowledge of chakra control allows the user to enhance its own life regeneration.

talent_saint_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Releases the user's cell regeneration limit when HP hits critical level.

talent_saint_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Creates a chakra focal point that discharges concentrated shockwaves to purge all positive status from the targets.

talent_saint_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Perfect chakra manipulation allows the user to impart life energy to others.

talent_saint_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Absolute chakra control over oneself enables the user to further enhance life regeneration.

talent_saint_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Unleashes the full potential of 'Saint Power' by pushing all cells in the body beyond its limit.

talent_insect_skill_1.talent_skill_description: A special insect shell grows on the body that improves defense and can remove harmful effects. Reduces damage taken and increases purify chance.

talent_insect_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Living in harmony with insects has triggered evolution. Increases max HP based on your max CP and recovers CP.

talent_insect_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Attacks the target using your insects to feed on the target's chakra. Drains the target's CP and stuns it if its CP turns to 0.

talent_insect_skill_4.talent_skill_description: The evolution progresses and new abilities have become available. Direct CP reduction and drain attacks has a chance to heal the user.

talent_insect_skill_5.talent_skill_description: The evolution has reached its final state increasing all attack damage. Increases all attack damage based on the user's max CP.

talent_insect_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Sends a swam of rare breed insects to zap its target. Reduces the target's CP and inflict 'Restriction' status. If the target's CP turns to 0 after the attack, the target can't recover CP for several turns.

talent_sm_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Use ultimate strings to give negative debuff to enemy and give positive effect for the user.

talent_sm_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Master the control of Marionette so that the user's body turning into a puppet to gain special buffs.

talent_sm_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Charge the enemy with puppet and stab them multiple times.

talent_sm_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Inject the enemy with Special Puppet Poison.

talent_sm_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Puppet Mode: Show the real self to gained a superb condition for a short period of time.

talent_sm_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Use all puppets to attack all enemies.

talent_sound_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Chance to reduce attack damage by enemy by hitting enemy with thunder-wind ninjutsu.

talent_sound_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Play the song of demon to interfere with the attention of target.

talent_sound_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Play the song of demon to temporarily erase jutsu knowledge of target. (PvP Jutsu)

talent_wood_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Chance to inflict Nature Power upon using Earth or Water skills (HP & CP Recovery).

talent_wood_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Entwine target with branches of tree.

talent_wood_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Entwine target with explosion of giant branches of a tree.

talent_lava_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Ignite Lava to increase damage of fire-earth ninjutsu.

talent_lava_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Stick target with pieces of lava when target attacks user. Affected target receives extra damage when user attacks with fire-earth ninjutsu.

talent_lava_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Create explosive clay bugs and dispatch them to target.

talent_shadow_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Any attack may inflict Capture (debuff) on target. Target under Capture status has lower dodge chance.

talent_shadow_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Restrict and strangle target by manipulating the shadow. Damage tripled when target is in 'Silhouette' status

talent_shadow_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Restrict and stab target with shadow spears. Damage tripled when target is in 'Silhouette' status

talent_ice_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Chance to freeze enemy by hitting enemy with wind-water ninjutsu.

talent_ice_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Freeze down all the moisture and form a armor. Damage will be decrease when being attacked and target will reduce CP.

talent_ice_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Hide yourself in hundreds of crystal and attack target back and forth between the crystals. Wind and Water Jutsu will increase their damage.

talent_iron_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Allows the user to manipulate ferrous particles, providing an occasional, formidable defense mechanism when under heavy attack.

talent_iron_skill_2.talent_skill_description: The user harnesses the power of iron sand to enter a heightened state, significantly enhancing their resilience and mental clarity.

talent_iron_skill_3.talent_skill_description: The user commands iron sand to execute a devastating strike, disrupting the enemy's energy flow and leaving them significantly more vulnerable to subsequent attacks.

talent_crystal_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Crystal Mastery is a passive skill that bestows the user with an exceptional bond to the mystical properties of crystals. This skill grants a heightened resistance to negative effects, allowing the user to partially ignore debuffs inflicted by enemies.

talent_crystal_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Secret: Crystal Summoner's Art is an enigmatic skill that channels the mystical energies of the crystals to sap the life force of enemies. This skill reduces the enemy's HP and CP by a fixed amount.

talent_crystal_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Secret: Crystal Rain Conjuration is a formidable skill that calls forth a shower of razor-sharp crystalline shards from the sky. When activated, a deluge of shimmering crystals rains down upon the battlefield, inflicting severe internal injuries and causing relentless bleeding.

talent_eoc_skill_1.talent_skill_description: Grants users the ability to foresee potential outcomes, guiding decisions and actions with insight into unfolding possibilities.

talent_eoc_skill_2.talent_skill_description: Harmonizes and amplifies inner energy, unlocking heightened awareness and empowering users with balance and spiritual strength.

talent_eoc_skill_3.talent_skill_description: Allows users to alter the flow of time, enabling them to pause, accelerate, rewind, or foresee events.

talent_eoc_skill_4.talent_skill_description: Binds the fabric of time, enabling the user to lock, seal, or manipulate temporal flows with precision and control.

talent_eoc_skill_5.talent_skill_description: Grants the user immense power by assimilating a tailed beast's energy, enhancing strength and abilities significantly.

talent_eoc_skill_6.talent_skill_description: Induces a perpetual sleep, trapping targets in an unending dreamscape, leaving them unaware of the outside world.

buffs.name: Strengthen
buffs.description: The strengthened target or user's attack damage increases by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Protection
buffs.description: The protected target or user will take less damage by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Attention
buffs.description: For a number of turns when the attentive target attacks, the attacked target's Dodge Rate decreases by a percentage amount.

buffs.name: Concentration
buffs.description: Increases critical chance of the target or user by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Energize
buffs.description: The energized user will have their critical chance, dodge rate, combustion, purify, and reactive force increased by a percentage amount. This lasts for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Extreme Mode
buffs.description: The user's damage for Taijutsu increases by a percentage amount for a number of turns. However, the user will go into the debuff state, Internal Injury.

buffs.name: CP Shield
buffs.description: If the target or user gets attacked, the user's CP will damaged and reduced instead of their HP with half the amount of damage that was inflicted for a number of turns. If the user's CP is 0, then further damage would go to HP.

buffs.name: Excitation
buffs.description: The excited target or user can use skills with no CP consumption for a number of turns. However, as a side effect, the target or user cannot charge for a number of turns, usually longer than the buffed effect.This buff is caused by the Fire Ninjutsu, Kinjutsu: Fire Energy Excitation. The side effect of this buff is similar to the debuff, Charge Disable.

buffs.name: Fire Wall
buffs.description: For a number of turns, when the target or user gets attacked, the attacker gets the Burn debuff with a percentage amount of HP loss each turn for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Flexible
buffs.description: The agile target or user's dodge rate increases by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Frenzy
buffs.description: Increase the frenzied target or user's attack damage by a percentage amount and critical chance by a percentage amount but takes extra damage by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Lightning Armor
buffs.description: The electrified target or user's damage for all attacks, critical chance, and accuracy increases by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Peace
buffs.description: The peaceful target or user's dodge rate increases by a percentage amount and CP is recovered by a percentage amount from total CP for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Rapid Cooldown
buffs.description: The target or user's cooldown for all skills (that are cooling down, excluding Talent skills) in and the skill casting this buff) decreases by a certain amount immediately.

buffs.name: Purify
buffs.description: Remove all debuffs from the target or user immediately.

buffs.name: Rage
buffs.description: The raging target or user's damage for all attacks, as well as damage taken by attacks, increases by a percentages amount for a number of turns. Also, if the target under Rage is attacked, the attacker takes some damage.

buffs.name: Serene Mind
buffs.description: If the target or user under Serene Mind is attacked, the target takes no damage but all the damage is reflected back to the attacker but the target still takes debuffs and other effects from the attack and are not reflected. This lasts for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Recover HP
buffs.description: The regenerating target or user's HP recovers by a percentage amount of its total HP.

buffs.name: Recover CP
buffs.description: The regenerating target or user's CP recovers by a percentage amount of its total CP

buffs.name: Regeneration
buffs.description: The regenerating target or user's HP recovers by a percentage amount of its total HP and become immune from debuffs for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Restoration
buffs.description: The Restoration target or user's HP recovers by a percentage/Fixed amount of its total HP.

buffs.name: Stealth
buffs.description: The stealthy target or user takes no damage from all attacks for a number of turns and damage to all the target's attacks increases by a percentage amount next turn.

buffs.name: Titan Mode
buffs.description: The user summons a Titan to the user's team. When the user declares any kind of attack, the summoned Titan will then attack the attacked target too. The Titan will only last for few turns.

buffs.name: Lava Shield
buffs.description: Stick target with pieces of lava when target attacks user. Affected target receives extra damage when user attacks with fire-earth ninjutsu.

buffs.name: Inquisitor
buffs.description: Increase user's Agility and Damage by 50% for 3 turns, but reduce self HP by 10% each turns.

buffs.name: Overwhelm
buffs.description: Inrease user's Dodge and agility.

buffs.name: Damage Absorb to HP
buffs.description: For a number of turns, when the user is attacked, there's a percentage amount of damage that will be converted into HP.

buffs.name: Damage Absorb to CP
buffs.description: For a number of turns, when the user is attacked, there's a percentage amount of damage that will be converted into CP.

buffs.name: Accuracy
buffs.description: Increase user's Hitrates, Reducing enemy dodge chance's by significant amount

buffs.name: Catalytic
buffs.description: The catalized user or target's attack damage increases by a percentage amount, but his/her HP will reduced by a percentage amount as a side effect. This lasts for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Debuff Resist
buffs.description: The user is unaffected by debuffs for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Ocean Armor
buffs.description: Increase Master Attack damage by 25% and Critical chance by 25%.

buffs.name: Kira Kuin
buffs.description: Clear master's debuff and Recover max HP by 100%

buffs.name: Alter Reality
buffs.description: Increase max HP and gain 'Strengthen' but reduce self CP by a percentage amount for a number of turns. (Cannot use Charge while this buff is active and this effect cannot be disperse or purify)

buffs.name: Self Love
buffs.description: Doubles max HP and CP for a number of turns, and reduces damage taken by a percentage amount. After duration end, you'll be stunned and damage taken from enemies who attacked you are doubles for 1 turn. (This effect cannot be dispersed)

buffs.name: Meditation
buffs.description: Enter Meditation Stance. Recover HP 10% and increase dodge chance by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Overload
buffs.description: Enter Overload State for for a number of turns. If user took damage when this buff active, the damage from enemy will be accumulated for each time enemy attack you. When you cast a skill / basic attack, launch follow-up attack with damage based 500 + accumulated damage from enemy. (Max Limit 2000 Damage accumulated). (This effect cannot be dispersed)

buffs.name: Demonic Curse
buffs.description: Reduce enemy HP by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Buff Negate
buffs.description: Make the enemy cannot apply buff for a number of turns

buffs.name: Vulnerable
buffs.description: Take extra damage and has their damage reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

buffs.name: CP Guard
buffs.description: Prevent enemy to reduce or drain user CP for a number of turns.

buffs.name: Wolfram
buffs.description: If the user receives more than x damage in a single turn, they have a y% chance to gain z% protection for the next turn.

buffs.name: Shield of Senju
buffs.description: A shield made of wood element which can sustain a certain amount of damage.

buffs.name: Hanyaoni
buffs.description: User cannot be healed for x turns. This jutsu cannot be purified but can be blocked by 'Debuff Resist'.

buffs.name: Reactive Force
buffs.description: When the player is attacked, the attacker takes some percentage amount of recoil damage.

debuffs.name: Burn
debuffs.description: Also known as burning, the burnt target loses a percentage amount of HP each of their turn for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Pet Burn
debuffs.description: Also known as burning that caused by user's pet, the burnt target loses a percentage amount of HP each of their turn for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Flaming
debuffs.description: The flamed target loses a percentage amount of HP each of their turn for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Blaze
debuffs.description: The blazing target loses percentage amount HP each of their turn for a number of turns. Every level up of Mirror of Passion will increase blaze time for 1 round, Blaze effect cant be purified.

debuffs.name: Poison
debuffs.description: The poisoned target loses a percentage amount of HP each of their turn for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Covid
debuffs.description: Target's loses a percentage amount of HP each of their turn for a number of turns and cant be purified.

debuffs.name: Bleeding
debuffs.description: A bleeding target takes extra damage from all attacks by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.description: The stunned target cannot move for a number of turns and when the target's turn comes, the target's turn will automatically be skipped.

debuffs.name: Blind
debuffs.description: The blinded target has his/her attack accuracy reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns. In terms of this, when the blinded target declares an attack, the attack has a lower chance of hitting. In terms of Accuracy vs. Dodge Rate, if the blinded target attacks an enemy with a high dodge rate, the chances of hitting the enemy will be even lower.

debuffs.name: Restriction
debuffs.description: The restricted target cannot perform any Ninjutsu for a certain amount of turns. When used against a target that is not a Ninja Saga player, the target will attack with their weapon.

debuffs.name: Sleep
debuffs.description: The sleeping target cannot move for a number of turns and when the target's turn comes, the target's turn will be skipped. However, if the target gets damaged, the effect of Sleep will end immediately.

debuffs.name: Chaos
debuffs.description: The chaotic target will do commands (attacking normally or with skills, dodge, charge) uncontrollably for a number of turns. The player of the target cannot control their character. If used on a non-player enemy, its turn will be automatically skipped, just like Restriction.

debuffs.name: Disoriented
debuffs.description: The distorted target will have their critical chance, dodge rate, combustion, purify, and reactive force reduced by a percentage amount amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Numb
debuffs.description: The target's dodge rate is decreased by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Disperse
debuffs.description: Removes all positive buffs from the target who is now dispelled from power-ups.

debuffs.name: Reduce Max HP
debuffs.description: Target's loses a percentage amount of their max HP.

debuffs.name: Reduce Current HP
debuffs.description: Target's loses a percentage amount of their current HP.

debuffs.name: Reduce Max CP
debuffs.description: Target's loses a percentage amount of their max CP.

debuffs.name: Reduce Current CP
debuffs.description: Target's loses a percentage amount of their current CP.

debuffs.name: Chill
debuffs.description: Inflict Bleeding by percentage amount and reduce enemy hp by percentage amount, after chill is applied to the enemy, their damage taken also reduced by 80%.

debuffs.name: Frostbite
debuffs.description: Target's loses a percentage amount of HP each of their turn for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Green Javelin
debuffs.description: Burn all target's percentage amount of HP  and inflict restriction and internal injury for number of turns

debuffs.name: Conduction
debuffs.description: The conducted target's dodge rate decreases by a certain percentage amount and when the the conducted target declares an attack the target's total CP will be reduced by a percentage amount. These effects lasts for a number of turns..

debuffs.name: Add Cooldown
debuffs.description: A random skill from the target will be put into a cooldown for a number of turns. This can also effect skills that were already in cooldown. Skills that were already in cooldown can be stacked with this.

debuffs.name: Oblivion
debuffs.description: The target's current CP is reduced by a percentage amount from its total CP immediately.

debuffs.name: Dismantle
debuffs.description: The dismantled target cannot normal attack for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Muddy
debuffs.description: The target's Purify chance is reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Embrace
debuffs.description: Reduce damage,dodge and purify chance of the enemy by percentage amount.

debuffs.name: Weaken
debuffs.description: The weakened target's damage for all attacks decreases by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Drain Max HP
debuffs.description: A percentage amount of the target's max HP will be drained and will be given to the user.

debuffs.name: Drain Current HP
debuffs.description: A percentage amount of the target's current HP will be drained and will be given to the user.

debuffs.name: Drain Max CP
debuffs.description: A percentage amount of the target's max CP will be drained and will be given to the user.

debuffs.name: Drain Current CP
debuffs.description: A percentage amount of the target's current CP will be drained and will be given to the user.

debuffs.name: Slow
debuffs.description: The target will have their agility reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Dark Curse
debuffs.description: The target will have their attack damage, critical chance, and dodge rate reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Internal Injury
debuffs.description: The injured target is unable to recover HP or use healing scrolls for a number of turns. The target can still use Refresh skills and other healing skills but would be useless.

debuffs.name: Meridian Seal
debuffs.description: The target cannot use skills or charge for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Capture
debuffs.description: The captured target's dodge rate decreases by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Kekkai
debuffs.description: The target's HP and CP are reduces by a percentage amount each turn for a number of turns or until the target uses up a percentage amount of CP.

debuffs.name: Fear
debuffs.description: There are two different effects of Fear, one that stuns the target and one that weakens the target.

debuffs.name: Prison
debuffs.description: The imprisoned target's HP and CP are reduced by a percentage amount and cannot move for a number of turns and when the target's turn comes, the target's turn will automatically be skipped.

debuffs.name: Fire Faint
debuffs.description: The target will take an extra amount of damage by a percentage amount from Fire Release Ninjutsu for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Water Faint
debuffs.description: The target will take an extra amount of damage by a percentage amount from Water Release Ninjutsu for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Earth Faint
debuffs.description: The target will take an extra amount of damage by a percentage amount from Earth Release Ninjutsu for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Wind Faint
debuffs.description: The target will take an extra amount of damage by a percentage amount Wind Release Ninjutsu for number of turns.

debuffs.name: Expose Defense
debuffs.description: The exposed Defense target takes extra damage from all attacks by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Increase CP Cost
debuffs.description: The target's CP consumption for skills increases by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Transform
debuffs.description: The Transformed target will take percentage amount of damage taken as CP and the CP cost will also increased by percentage for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Theft
debuffs.description: Target's with Theft effect will lose percentage amount of HP when dealing damage under the Theft debuff and the lost HP will be drained by the user's of this skill.

debuffs.name: Barrier
debuffs.description: The secured target cannot attack or use offensive skills for a number of turns but may still be able to use defensive skills on self, dodge, or recharge.

debuffs.name: Anesthesia
debuffs.description: Cast Protection on the user: Reduces damage the user takes by a percentage amount for a number of turns, recover the user's HP each turn by a percentage amount for a number of turns, inflict Chakra Disable on the user (The user cannot charge CP for a number of turns).

debuffs.name: Frozen
debuffs.description: The frozen target cannot move and all damage inflicted to the frozen target is reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns and when the target's turn comes, the target's turn will automatically be skipped.

debuffs.name: Petrify
debuffs.description: The petrified target (turned to stone) cannot move for a number of turns and when the target's turn comes, the target's turn will automatically be skipped. However, the target takes no damage from all attacks during this time.

debuffs.name: Darkness
debuffs.description: The dark-sighted target's accuracy and dodge rate is decreased by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Distract
debuffs.description: The distracted target's critical chance is reduced by a percentage amount for a number of turns.

debuffs.name: Calm
debuffs.description: Removes all positive buffs from the target who is now relaxed.

debuffs.name: Lock
debuffs.description: The locked target cannot move for a number of turns and when the target's turn comes, the target's turn will automatically be skipped.

debuffs.name: Suffocate
debuffs.description: Target HP and CP are reduced by a percentage amount and cannot heal for a number of turns.

summary.title: Summary
summary.subtitle: Dark Garuda Invasion
summary.content: Protect your village from these advancing threats by strategically battling each enemy. Successfully defeating each foe will pave the way for the final confrontation againts Dark Garuda. Gear up, cooperate with ancient warrior, and prepare for an epic defense to safeguard your home and its people.

teahouseBtn.name: Tea House
teahouseBtn.description: Extra times for daily mini game

boss.name: Wyvern
boss.description: Wyvern is a leg-less dragon with a sharp tail to sting their target with venom.

boss.name: Manticore
boss.description: Manticore is an ancient creature with a sharp tail to struck their target with lightning.

boss.name: Basilisk
boss.description: A legendary serpent known as the king of snakes, whose deadly gaze can turn victims to stone.

scene_1.dialogue: Report! There's an unknown force raiding the village.
We're still evacuating, but the enemy is strong. It's difficult.
Darn it. Send all ninjas to defeat them!
For our lord, destroy this village.
Stop! We won’t let you go any further.
So you’ve come. Finally, a worthy challenge. Let’s end this..

scene_2.dialogue: Don't be too happy. Our god will finish you all off. Be prepared.
That is not necessary. Because right now we are the ones who will attack your god.
We have found the enemy's location. To all ninjas, it is time to counterattack
So, you’ve come, mortals. Do you think you’re safe after what you did to Zeus? Now, face the wrath of a god!

scene_3.dialogue: Don’t get too happy, mortals. My brothers will avenge us. Your time will come.
We may not know what’s next, but today, we’ve won. Ninjas, return to the village.

scene_1.dialogue: We’ve tracked you down, Pitch. The time for games is over. This ends now.
You think you’ve beaten me? Foolish ninjas. I am darkness incarnate. You may have shattered my body, but my spirit is eternal. Santa was just the beginning. You won’t stop me again.
We’ll stop you, Pitch. We’ll make sure your darkness never touches Christmas again.
Christmas is already mine! I’ll watch as the light fades from the world, and there’s nothing you can do to stop me!
Stay focused. We need to fight with everything we’ve got. Pitch’s power is growing, and this time we’ll defeat him once and for all.
You’ll have to do better than that!

scene_2.dialogue: Is it over? Have we defeated him for good?
Not yet. There’s something still wrong. He’s not… truly gone.
Fools! You think you’ve won? I am more than just a force of darkness—I am its awakening. You will not escape me this time!
This is it, Pitch. You’ve had your fun. Now it’s time to end this.
You’re wrong, Kage. *This* is the end—for *you*. I’ve returned stronger than ever, and this time, I’m not alone. I’ve bound Santa’s spirit to my will. Together, we’ll see Christmas burn!
Join me, Kage. There’s no point in resisting. The magic of Christmas has already died.
We won’t let you win, Pitch! You can’t take Christmas from us.
We won’t just fight you—we’ll free Santa from this curse. Together, we can break your hold on him.
Foolish ninjas. You think you can save him? You’ll have to go through *me* first!

scene_3.dialogue: I... I’m so sorry, my friends. The darkness... it took me. I didn’t want to hurt anyone. I thought I had lost everything.
You’ve been through so much, Santa. But we’ve saved you, and with your heart restored, Christmas will be saved as well.
The light of Christmas is returning, stronger than ever.
Thank you. You’ve given me back what I thought was lost forever. The spirit of Christmas lives on, thanks to you.
Together, we’ll make sure it always will.

bosses.name: Queen of Hearts
bosses.description: The Queen of Heart is ruthless and controlling, ruling through fear and manipulation.
